lead_paragraph: A year after the release of a damning report into widespread doping, Russian track and field is hopeful of a way back into the global fold.

headline.print_headline: 1 Year After Doping Report, Russian Track Team Seeks Return
headline.main: 1 Year After Doping Report, Russian Track Team Seeks Return
